title: Variant of plate (page 45) from Le Désespéranto (Desesperanto): Volume III from L'Antitête (The Anti-Head)
medium: Etching with watercolor and ink additions from an illustrated book with 46 etchings (23 with aquatint, 23 with pochoir, eight with drypoint, and eight with watercolor and ink additions)
dimensions: composition and page: 5 5/8 x 4 3/8" (14.3 x 11.1 cm)
